item.title: Work
item.description: üë®‚Äçüíª You can find some projects on GitHub üëâ You can find my profile on LinkedIn üí¨ You can ask me about cloud Experience Advisory Architect (2023-present, IBM) I am a cloud-native enthusiast fascinated by DevSecOps and modern software engineering practices. Besides hands-on delivery, I lead multiple global delivery projects for global systems across the major hyperscalers. Thereby, skill and people development, as well as software-driven change management, are key aspects of the work I do deliver with passion.
